DOC.HEADLINE: SOUTHLAND PREVIEW / THE BUSINESS WEEK AHEAD : ORANGE COUNTY
DOC.TEXT: Economic Forecast Due : The first of the season ' s crop of 1995 economic outlook reports for Orange County will be delivered Friday at Cal State Fullerton by economics_department Chairman Anil Puri . This is the third annual county forecast by the university ' s Institute for Economic and Environmental Studies and comes at a time when the signals are quite mixed.On the negative side , a long-awaited recovery is being threatened by a series of major plant closures and continued aerospace and computer_industry layoffs . But state employment officials also say they underestimated job growth in California and that there may have been 200 # 000 more jobs created than originally thought . Against that backdrop , Puri will deliver his reading on the county ' s economic future , while First Interstate Bancorp economist Lynn Reaser will discuss the state and national forecasts .
